Indapamide AND contact your doctor. Follow-up John sees his GP 7 days after discharge for follow-up review. He and Mary purchased a home Blood Hypertension monitor and checked his Blood Hypertension and Blood Glucose levels daily; these have remained stable and within acceptable ranges. The GP advises John he can decrease to second daily Blood Glucose monitoring, and three times weekly Blood Hypertension monitoring. The GP refers John for a comprehensive medicines review.
